item.title: Calling all binary coders
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

omgâ€¦[code=cpp]using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Text;
using System.IO;

namespace BinDec
{
class Program
{
static void Main(string[] args)
{
Console.Write("Enter Binary: ");
string bin = Console.ReadLine();

        int dec = BinaryToDecimal(bin);

        if ( dec < 0 )
        {
            Console.WriteLine("You've supplied some invalid binary");
        }
        else
        {
            Console.WriteLine("Decimal: {0}", dec);
        }

        // Holding the console window open until enter is pressed
        Console.ReadLine();
    }

    static int BinaryToDecimal(string bin)
    {
        int a, b, c, d;
        int length, sum = 0;

        length = bin.Length - 1;

        for (a = 0; a <= length; a++)
        {
            c = Int32.Parse(bin[a].ToString());

            if ((c > 1) || (c < 0))
            {
                return -1;
            }

            for (d = 1, b = length; b > a; b--)
            {
                d *= 2;
            }

            sum += c * d;
        }

        return sum;
    }
}

}[/code]
